Name: Attle
Notes: Fourth sun/star that provides light for Kolob

Name: Kolob
Notes: Planet where the children settled after leaving previous worlds

Name: Bios
Notes: Ancestral lineage/evolutionary line whose children sowed the land

Name: Viros
Notes: Ancestral lineage/evolutionary line whose kin ensured life would spread

Name: Aster
Notes: Cosmic/divine entity providing guidance and grace to the people

Name: Andromeda
Notes: Cosmic/divine entity providing grace alongside Aster

Name: Anti-Alpha
Notes: Antagonistic cosmic force born from discontent and denial of love

Name: Berserkers
Notes: Cosmic entities bringing chaotic destruction with comet fire

Name: Sol
Notes: Fifth sun/star that beckons with golden light after Attle
